mapper.sql: ID, REPORT_DATE, DIC_REPORT_TYPE_KEY, NOTE_PERSON, FILE_PATH, CULPRIT_ID, DIC_ISCOMPLIED_KEY, DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY, NOTE, ASSESS_MANAGER, DOCUMENT_ID, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG, (select g.name from SYS_GROUP g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.GROUP_ID where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) groupName, (select c.name from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) culpritName
mapper.insert: insert into SF_THINK_REPORT (ID, REPORT_DATE, DIC_REPORT_TYPE_KEY, NOTE_PERSON, FILE_PATH, CULPRIT_ID, DIC_ISCOMPLIED_KEY, DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY, NOTE, ASSESS_MANAGER, DOCUMENT_ID, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dicReportTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicIscompliedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicReportStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SF_THINK_REPORT
ID,
REPORT_DATE,
DIC_REPORT_TYPE_KEY,
NOTE_PERSON,
FILE_PATH,
CULPRIT_ID,
DIC_ISCOMPLIED_KEY,
DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY,
NOTE,
ASSESS_MANAGER,
DOCUMENT_ID,
CREATED,
CREATER,
UPDATED,
UPDATER,
DEL_FLAG,

mapper.update:
update SF_THINK_REPORT
REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_REPORT_TYPE_KEY = #{dicReportTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_PERSON = #{notePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_ISCOMPLIED_KEY = #{dicIscompliedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY = #{dicReportStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSESS_MANAGER = #{assessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_THINK_REPORT set REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIC_REPORT_TYPE_KEY = #{dicReportTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_PERSON = #{notePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_ISCOMPLIED_KEY = #{dicIscompliedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY = #{dicReportStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESS_MANAGER = #{assessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=CULPRIT_ID)
AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.name like '%'||#{culpritName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
